about_the_game:
What happens if you're stuck at home with your pretty sister? Crazy talk, conspiracy theories, random encounters. The playful mood never leaves our heroes. A small kinetic visual novel about a geek brother and a beautiful sister who find themselves locked at home alone with each other after a long separation.

Yuki and Yamato were separated in childhood, but by chance they met again. Will they be able to find a common language? Can they get along? Or will the years of separation prevent them from becoming close again? And what is the reason for their imprisonment?

This story is full of romance, humor and touching moments!



  • Age - 19
  • Height - 165 cm
  • Weight - 50 kg
Yuki had just entered university, but things didn't go according to plan. A kind, slightly phlegmatic girl who tends to hide her true feelings behind sharp jokes.

content_descriptors.notes: A censored finger cut in the kitchen, a slight slap in the face. That's all.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: What happens if you're stuck at home with your pretty sister? Crazy talk, conspiracy theories, random encounters. The playful mood never leaves our heroes. A visual novel about the adventure of two young people locked at home!
supported_languages: English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Russian
